Interviews Consciousness Financial Important Leadership Articles Teachings Technology **Cobra Interview by the White Dragon(6th June 2025): Financial System, Conscious economy, Financial Reset, New society, Artificial Intelligence, Energies…)** **Friday, June 6, 2025** **Cobra Interview by the White Dragon** FInancial Reset & Economy What are the two versions of the financial reset?The most known version of the financial reset is being prepared by the WEF associated negative faction. It would be triggered by engineered collapse of the banking system, followed by the introduction of CBDCs, which would enable total financial control of the population. The other version of the financial reset is being prepared by the Templar associated positive faction, which would introduce gold and asset backed basket of currencies, combined with debt jubilee. This would bring more financial freedom to humanity.https://prepareforchange.net/2025/05/29/cobra-25th-may-2025-positive-templarswesak-2025-4-synthesis-of-the-4-workshopswesak-activationportal-2025-interview-cobra-pfc-japan-positive-templars-grail-bloodline/ What are the two versions of the financial reset? The most known version of the financial reset is being prepared by the WEF associated negative faction. How can individuals and businesses prepare for economic shifts?Gold and silver are the best hedge against wars, economic instability and the collapse of trust in the system. Technology & Free Will How does artificial intelligence (AI) influence human free will and decision-making?AI is just a trendy and fancy name for a bit more sophisticated computer programs that will never be able to replace human consciousness. However, humans are lazy and are in many cases more than willing to surrender their thinking process to an AI program. Therefore, AI can not interfere with your free will unless you let it. AI is just a trendy and fancy name for a bit more sophisticated computer programs that will never be able to replace human consciousness. However, humans are lazy and are in many cases more than willing to surrender their thinking process to an AI program. Therefore, AI can not interfere with your free will unless you let it. However, humans are lazy and are in many cases more than willing to surrender their thinking process to an AI program. Therefore, AI can not interfere with your free will unless you let it. What security challenges arise from integrating AI with blockchain technology?The most imminent security challenge is for AI bots to take over cryptocurrency trading platforms. Theoretically, an advanced AI could take over most cryptocurrency assets available and even endanger the rest of the banking system. Hidden Wealth & Geopolitics What is the Yamashita gold, and how does it relate to global finance?Yamashita gold is a huge stash of gold that was hidden in bunkers in the Philippines towards the end of WW2. This gold was looted by the Japanese army form the vast areas of southwest Asia and China. After WW2, much of that gold was transferred into the US and Switzerland and formed the backbone of private placement programs. Most profits of those programs went into black budget military projects, such as advanced military technologies and underground military bases. What role do private placement programs (PPP) play in the financial system?The real private placement programs are financial vehicles for insiders in the occult economy to invest their wealth to generate huge profits. There are also many fake private placement programs which are designed as fraudulent tools to milk investors form their hard earned money. Occult & Wealth Energy What is the occult significance of emeralds in the Exter pyramid?Gold is traditionally known as the bottom of the Exter pyramid, being the safest and most stable asset because it is nobody’s liability. In occult economy, gem grade rough emerald are placed even below gold in Exter pyramid, because they are much rarer. Yearly production of gold is about 3000 metric tons, where yearly production of emeralds is about 10,000 times smaller. Also, other precious stones such as diamonds, rubies and sapphires are quite common throughout the Solar system, whereas emeralds remain rare even there. Diamond production could be easily increased many times with asteroid mining in the next few decades, not so with emeralds.Bogota, Colombia Cobra Workshop Notes (“New Atlantis”+Emeralds+Emerald tablets,5-6 May 2024)https://prepareforchange.net/2024/05/16/bogota-colombia-cobra-workshop-notes-new-atlantisemeraldsemerald-tablets5-6-may-2024/ What is the occult significance of emeralds in the Exter pyramid? Basically, all matter tends to manifest from the original idea towards the physical plane because of entropy. There are many cycles which dictate how long and under which conditions certain idea will manifest. Astrology is a crude attempt to describe some of those cycles, because planets of the Solar system create interference patterns in the plasma scalar field which influence how things tend to manifest. There are also other cycles involved which are not so widely known except in very secret occult groups. Understanding of those cycles and their utilization can be a great tool in investing. This leads to unfortunate consequence that most of financial assets are in the hands of people who misuse them against the benefit of humanity. They are at the forefront of the next step of evolution of humanity. Unfortunately, they usually lack abundance, and a foundation would need to be created to bring financial support to key Lightworkers and sponsor their projects. Many billions are being donated into sponsoring “cancer research” without much clear benefit, where only a fraction of that money donated to key Lightworkers can trigger a new Renaissance. Unfortunately, they usually lack abundance, and a foundation would need to be created to bring financial support to key Lightworkers and sponsor their projects. Many billions are being donated into sponsoring “cancer research” without much clear benefit, where only a fraction of that money donated to key Lightworkers can trigger a new Renaissance. A global financial blockchain network would enable fast, easy and transparent transactions and virtually eliminate fraud.
